full_summary:
**Request for Information: Data Collection Modernization (DCM)**
===========================================================

**Request Summary**
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking industry feedback on the requirements for Data Collection Modernization (DCM). This Request for Information (RFI) provides an opportunity for industry stakeholders to provide input and insight on DCM.

**RFP Details**
--------------

| Category | Information | Details |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS4105045039-Doc4108326218 |  |
| Solicitation No. | WS4105045039 |  |
| Publication Date | July 21, 2023 |  |
| Tender Closing Date | August 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT |  |
| Expected Contract Start and End Date | None |  |
| Tender Status | Expired |  |
| UNSPSC Category | 81110000 Computer services |  |

**Industry Requirements**
----------------------

The successful bidder will be required to:

* Evaluate DCM requirements
* Identify potential solutions to modernize data collection

**Important Contact Information**
-------------------------------

* Li, Huajun, SPAC/PSPC, huajun.li@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

Further information regarding the RFI can be found at the following link:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16931059?extsite=MTY5MzEwNTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The original data was provided by the contractor in a poor format for easy readability. In the rewritten output above, only relevant and required data were taken and formatted to nice markdown format. 
Please review the rewritten output carefully to ensure that all original details were included. You can refer to the original data if needed.
